nodes.text: Laan Tik was a Kajain'sa'Nikto member of the Jedi Order who served as a Jedi General of the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. Tik participated in the Battle of Mimban in 22 BBY, along with Clone Captain Rex, the 501st Legion, and the Mud Jumpers of the 224th Division. The Jedi was killed during the battle, and Tik's blue lightsaber was later used by Junior Representative Jar Jar Binks to save Rex's life.

Laan Tik was a member of the Kajain'sa'Nikto subspecies of the Nikto species who rose who rose through the ranks of the Jedi Order, holding the status of Jedi General of the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars against the Confederacy of Independent Systems. In 22 BBY, Tik participated in the Battle of Mimban, where the Jedi served with Clone Captain CT-7567 "Rex" and members of his 501st Legion as well as the Mud Jumpers of the 224th Division.

During the intense battle against the forces of the Separatist Droid Army, Rex ordered the 501st Legion to advance and the Mud Jumpers to reinforce Tik. The general, however, replied that help was not needed and Force pushed a number of B1-series battle droids. While the Clone Captain and fellow 501st Legion clone trooper Hardcase spoke on evacuating Junior Representative Jar Jar Binks out of the area, Tik was killed by a shot to the chest. Following the death of the general, Binks paid respects to Tik's body and took Tik's lightsaber so that it would not fall into enemy hands. Since Galactic Republic forces were being defeated, Rex ordered a retreat.

Following Tik's death, Binks was the highest-ranking member of the Republic forces on Mimban, and thus the chain of command fell to him. Not wanting to lose more lives while destroying the Separatist shield generator, the Republic's target of the mission, Rex ordered that Republic High Command be contacted for extraction. However, he also planned to proceed to the shield generator alone and destroy it.

After fighting through Separatist forces for hours, Rex was wounded. Before the Separatists' droids could kill him, however, Binks managed to save the clone using Tik's lightsaber. At first, Rex confused Binks for Tik until the Representative revealed himself. He then took the lightsaber to prevent the Gungan from accidentally hurting himself, and they proceeded towards the shield generator together, destroying droid forces with blasters. During the fighting, Binks asked if he could use the lightsaber, to which the captain refused.

As a Jedi General, Laan Tik fought in the frontlines of battle. When Captain Rex ordered that the Mud Jumpers assist the General, Tik refused the help, demonstrating confidence in the fighting abilities acquired thanks to Jedi training. However, Tik died shortly after. Tik had purple skin and green eyes.
Laan Tik, being Force-sensitive, was able to Force push during combat. Tik could also wield a lightsaber.
As a Jedi General, Tik wore Jedi Commander armor along with Jedi robes and utilized a blue lightsaber during combat.

Laan Tik appeared in the comic story "501 Plus One," written by Marc Guggenheim and illustrated by Caspar Wijngaard and Cris Peter. The story was published in the one-shot comic Age of Republic Special 1 by Marvel Comics on January 16, 2019.
